name: AgentRuntimeOperator
description: Turn-key agent runtime that wraps profile, planner, MCP registry, and summarizer for Studio drag-and-drop workflows.

parameters.name: profile
parameters.label: Agent Profile
parameters.description: BaseProfile dict (name, role, goals, tasks, language, tone).

parameters.name: generator
parameters.label: Generator Config
parameters.description: Either a generator object reference or config dict for OpenAI/HF generators.

parameters.name: tools
parameters.label: MCP Tools
parameters.description: List of tool specs: module/class pairs or ready objects registered to MCPRegistry.

parameters.name: runtime
parameters.label: Runtime Options
parameters.description: AgentRuntime options such as max_steps or summarizer strategy (reuse_generator).
